name: PIMRIDE
description: With the slogan Pimp your ride, users can purchase and combine various cars through the blockchain-based TCG racing game provided by the Pimride ecosystem, and enjoy racing games with other users with their own car through NFT. And users can also get rewards. In the Pimride game, limited edition cars, high-grade vehicle components, collections, etc. are issued as NFTs to stimulate users' desire to collect. Collectibles have different values ​​according to their rarity and ability, and their rarity is determined by their impact on the game.
